description:
PPC Training: Advanced Underground Traffic Strategies

PLEASE READ THE 5 STAR REVIEWS BEFORE BUYING THE COURSE!

Course is up-to-date with March, 2016 information!

*Added Brief Update Content in March of 2016

Learn how to use SECRET-UNDERGROUND Traffic Platforms (Everyone is Talking about Google AdWords and Facebook Ads.. Let me Show you How to Tap Into Some Other Multiple-Streams of Traffic) to grow your business online. 30-day money back guarantee.

Learn the ins and outs of PPC (pay-per-click) and digital marketing. This comprehensive course covers everything you need to know about PAY PER CLICK + INTELLIGENT KEYWORD SELECTION + BEGINNER’S MARKETING FUNNEL GUIDE COURSE.

Learn how to create, run and optimize under-ground networks and platform campaigns and becoming pro starting from zero knowledge. Complete step-by-step walk-through, as if you are watching me creating campaigns standing behind my shoulder. By real world example, i will illustrate you some secret strategies, and how you can grow your business exponentially with pay-per-click advertising.

As a bonus, we'll also cover Tracking your Stats fundamentals With powerful Clickmeter Platform.

Learn and Master the Essentials to Internet Marketing to create profitable Campaigns for your Small Business. And LEARN ABOUT SOME AMAZING UNDERGROUND PLATFORMS THAT NOT-A-LOT-OF-MARKETERS-TALK-ABOUT

If you have a website or run your business online, I’m about to read your mind: You want more people to visit your site, more people to like your stuff, and more people to buy from you.

To sum it up ... you need help with marketing.

Marketing is like a pie.

The whole pie is all of your customers and there are different ways to reach them: social media, email marketing, SEO, etc.

Some slices may be bigger as you may get more customers from SEO (20% of your pie) vs. content marketing (only 2% of your pie). To truly be successful with your marketing, it’s important to try the different slices and find out which ones bring you the most customers.

One of the simplest and most successful marketing slices I've used throughout my career is paid search advertising on Multiple Traffic Sources.

So, if you own a hot sauce business and someone searches for "delicious hot sauce", you're able to show relevant ads and get that person on your site to buy your hot sauce. But, if you don’t know what you’re doing with paid ads, it’s one of the riskier methods and can suck up a ton of your money.

If you’ve always been intimidated by paid marketing and want to finally add it to your marketing pie, I have something just for you:A course that teaches you exactly how to run ads on Underground PPC Platforms that don’t waste money and actually drive sales(As Cheap as 10 to 15 cents per click).

The course consists of 2 hours of high-quality video content cut up into small, digestible and organized segments.This is for anyone who's new to paid search advertising. It'll show you how to go from ZERO to having a campaign that's live and driving relevant traffic.

Here’s exactly what you'll learn:

> How To Get Super-Targeted Traffic at Very Cheap, Like 10 to 15 Cents Per Click

> Understand Mind-Set of Your Targeted Traffic Find Profitable Keywords

> Write Better Ads

> Analyze Campaign Performance

> Optimize with Advanced Techniques

> Keywords: Learn the different keyword match types and how to best use them

> Increasing CTR: Learn how to increase your click-through-rate (CTR) with ad extensions and dynamic keyword insertion

> Getting sales from Underground Platforms that are not-Widely-Known-Yet: Learn how to use Secret Platforms that I use for myself to drive sales, not likes or other vanity metrics

> Clickmeter: How to pull valuable reports on a daily basis and how to apply them to your marketing

> From scratch: How to create Pay Per Click campaigns from scratch

> Tons and tons more: With over 14+ lessons, you'll learn how to start using paid marketing for your business immediately

All of the content in the course was updated in late Jan 2016, so you know you’re getting the most up-to-date information.

Don't waste hours of your time going through other people’s blog posts, forums, and trial-and-error to learn how to use ads to get new customers.

P.S. - Every Udemy course comes with a free, 30-days, 100% satisfaction guarantee. If, for whatever reason, you're not fully satisfied you can ask for a full refund.

Tap Into Million's Of People With Advanced Laser-Targeted Strategies

Learning the fundamentals of marketing and core-desire of your viewers will enable your small business to reach millions of potential customers the exact moment they are searching for your business. I will show you exactly how i create laser targeted ads and long-tail keywords, in order to reach to only those who are ready for my offer and how ads will only appear on a potential customer's screen when he or she is searching for a product or service your small business offers.

Content and Overview

In this course we will walk with you, holding your hand in the beginning, showing you the exact steps for setting up your account and giving you a walk-through of Not-Widely-Known, But Amazing Results Providing Platforms

By the end of the course, you will be running full speed, being able to analyze, optimize, and ultimately create profitable campaigns on your own accord And Will be able to select a right PPC platform for your budget and your niche.
title: Online Traffic Generation Complete Walk-through
